document_data.mainbody:
ndals Lane was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Undals Lane was located in the south section of Waterdeeps North Ward. The road branched east off of the north side of Andamaars Street, connecting with Golden Serpent Street just north of Black Cat Way. An unnamed alley branched off the north side of Undals Lane leading to the Magecourt.
Downybeard Tobacconist sat on the eastern side of Undals Lane where it joined Golden Serpent Street.
